title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Manzanar National Historic Site The 814 acre site is open every day from dawn to dusk. Visitor CenterOpen Daily Summer Hours 9:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m.     June 1 - September 30Winter Hours 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.     October 1 - March 31Block 14 Barracks 1, Barracks 8, and Mess Hall ExhibitsOpen Daily9:00 a.m. to 5:15 p.m.  Closed December 25
